name: Pixel Hentai Mosaic
description:
Pixel Hentai Mosaic will test power of your logical thinking and desire to see uncensored pixel hentai.
You need to rely on your mind, use it to complete the image of its mixed parts reveal the intrigue.

Features:
  • Original hentai pixel art drawn specially for this game
  • Modes 3x3, 4x4 and 5x5
  • 100 achievements
  • 10 levels
  • Gallery mode
  • Censor On/Off mode for letsplayers and streamers (only for 3x3 and 4x4 modes)
  • Relaxing music

Free updates in the next few months:
  • 10 absolutely new levels!
  • New music!

What was added after release:
  • Mode 4x4
  • Mode 5x5
  • Galery mode
  • Few features for comfortable playing
